abstract: A doctor who led a key trial of two heart drugs accused their makers, Merck and Schering-Plough, last July of hiding the negative results.
snippet: A doctor who led a key trial of two heart drugs accused their makers, Merck and Schering-Plough, last July of hiding the negative results.
lead_paragraph: CHICAGO  The lead outside investigator on a crucial trial of two widely used heart drugs said in an e-mail message last July that Merck and Schering-Plough, the companies that make the drugs, were deliberately delaying the release of the trial results “to hide something.”

headline.main: Accusations of Delays in Releasing Drug Results
headline.print_headline: Accusations Of Delays In Releasing Drug Results
